1.6.name: wordpress/poker-cards
1.6.description:
This is a simple plug-in to display playing cards in a more visual fashion. It is looseley based on Chris Halverson's "pokerhand".

Many people will describe poker hands by writing something like "AsKh". Using the wrp-cards plug-in, you can easily display the playing cards in a graphical way by prefixing the cards by a ':'. Ex. :As :Kh.

To view wrp-cards in action go to: http://www.WarRoomPoker.com/wrpcards.php

As an option, you can use the "normal" card color (red and black) or you can use 4 color cards: Diamond : Blue Heart : Red Spade : Black Club : Green
